results.title: Inception
results.overview: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets.

results.title: The Dark Knight
results.overview: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind seeking chaos in Gotham City.

results.title: Pulp Fiction
results.overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine.

results.title: The Shawshank Redemption
results.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

results.title: The Godfather
results.overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

results.title: Forrest Gump
results.overview: A man with a low IQ witnesses and unwittingly influences several defining historical events in the 20th century USA.

results.title: The Matrix
results.overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

results.title: Schindler's List
results.overview: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
results.overview: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

results.title: Inglourious Basterds
results.overview: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.
